verses.verse: Against Moab<WH4124> thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel;<WH3478> Woe<WH1945> to Nebo!<WH5015> for it is spoiled:<WH7703> Kiriathaim<WH7156> is confounded<WH3001> and taken:<WH3920> Misgab<WH4869> is confounded<WH3001> and dismayed.<WH2865>

There shall be no<WH369> more<WH5750> praise<WH8416> of Moab:<WH4124> in Heshbon<WH2809> they have devised<WH2803> evil<WH7451> against<WH5921> it; come,<WH3212> and let us cut<WH3772> it off from being a nation.<WH1471> Also<WH1571> you shall be cut<WH1826> down, O Madmen;<WH4086> the sword<WH2719> shall pursue<WH3212> you.
A voice<WH6963> of crying<WH6818> shall be from Horonaim,<WH2773> spoiling<WH7701> and great<WH1419> destruction.<WH7667>
Moab<WH4124> is destroyed;<WH7665> her little<WH6810> ones have caused a cry<WH2201> to be heard.<WH8085>

For in the going<WH4608> up of Luhith<WH3872> continual weeping<WH1065> shall go<WH5927> up; for in the going<WH4174> down<WH4174> of Horonaim<WH2773> the enemies<WH6862> have heard<WH8085> a cry<WH6818> of destruction.<WH7667>
Flee,<WH5127> save<WH4422> your lives,<WH5315> and be like the heath<WH6176> in the wilderness.<WH4057>

For because<WH3588> <WH3282> you have trusted<WH982> in your works<WH4639> and in your treasures,<WH214> you shall also<WH1571> be taken:<WH3920> and Chemosh<WH3645> shall go<WH3318> forth<WH3318> into captivity<WH1473> with his priests<WH3548> and his princes<WH8269> together.<WH3162>

And the spoiler<WH7703> shall come<WH935> on every<WH3605> city,<WH5892> and no<WH3808> city<WH5892> shall escape:<WH4422> the valley<WH6010> also shall perish,<WH6> and the plain<WH4334> shall be destroyed,<WH8045> as the LORD<WH3068> has spoken.<WH559>

Give<WH5414> wings<WH6731> to Moab,<WH4124> that it may flee<WH5323> and get<WH3318> away:<WH3318> for the cities<WH5892> thereof shall be desolate,<WH8047> without<WH369> any to dwell<WH3427> therein.<WH2004>
Cursed<WH779> be he that does<WH6213> the work<WH4399> of the LORD<WH3068> deceitfully,<WH7423> and cursed<WH779> be he that keeps<WH4513> back<WH4513> his sword<WH2719> from blood.<WH1818>

Moab<WH4124> has been at ease<WH7599> from his youth,<WH5271> and he has settled<WH8252> on<WH413> his lees,<WH8105> and has not been emptied<WH7324> from vessel<WH3627> to vessel,<WH3627> neither<WH3808> has he gone<WH1980> into captivity:<WH1473> therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> his taste<WH2940> remained<WH5975> in him, and his scent<WH7381> is not changed.<WH4171>

Therefore,<WH5921> <WH3651> behold,<WH2009> the days<WH3117> come,<WH935> said<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> that I will send<WH7971> to him wanderers,<WH6808> that shall cause him to wander,<WH6808> and shall empty<WH7324> his vessels,<WH3627> and break<WH5310> their bottles.<WH5035>
And Moab<WH4124> shall be ashamed<WH954> of Chemosh,<WH3645> as the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> was ashamed<WH954> of Bethel<WH1008> their confidence.<WH4009>
How<WH349> say<WH559> you, We are mighty<WH1368> and strong<WH2428> men<WH582> for the war?<WH4421>

Moab<WH4124> is spoiled,<WH7703> and gone<WH5927> up out of her cities,<WH5892> and his chosen<WH4005> young<WH970> men are gone<WH3381> down<WH3381> to the slaughter,<WH2874> said<WH5002> the King,<WH4428> whose name<WH8034> is the LORD<WH3068> of hosts.<WH6635>
The calamity<WH343> of Moab<WH4124> is near<WH7138> to come,<WH935> and his affliction<WH7451> hastens<WH4116> fast.<WH3966>

All<WH3605> you that are about<WH5439> him, bemoan<WH5110> him; and all<WH3605> you that know<WH3045> his name,<WH8034> say,<WH559> How<WH349> is the strong<WH5797> staff<WH4294> broken,<WH7665> and the beautiful<WH8597> rod!<WH4731>

You daughter<WH1323> that do inhabit<WH3427> Dibon,<WH1769> come<WH3381> down<WH3381> from your glory,<WH3519> and sit<WH3427> in thirst;<WH6772> for the spoiler<WH7703> of Moab<WH4124> shall come<WH5927> on you, and he shall destroy<WH7843> your strong<WH4013> holds.<WH4013>
O inhabitant<WH3427> of Aroer,<WH6177> stand<WH5975> by the way,<WH1870> and espy;<WH6822> ask<WH7592> him that flees,<WH5127> and her that escapes,<WH4422> and say,<WH559> What<WH4100> is done?
Moab<WH4124> is confounded;<WH3001> for it is broken<WH2865> down: howl<WH3213> and cry;<WH2199> tell<WH5046> you it in Arnon,<WH769> that Moab<WH4124> is spoiled,<WH7703>
And judgment<WH4941> is come<WH935> on the plain<WH4334> country;<WH776> on Holon,<WH2473> and on Jahazah,<WH3096> and on Mephaath,<WH4158>
And on Dibon,<WH1769> and on Nebo,<WH5015> and on Bethdiblathaim,<WH1015>
And on Kiriathaim,<WH7156> and on Bethgamul,<WH1014> and on Bethmeon,<WH1010>
And on Kerioth,<WH7152> and on Bozrah,<WH1224> and on all<WH3605> the cities<WH5892> of the land<WH776> of Moab,<WH4124> far<WH7350> or near.<WH7138>
The horn<WH7161> of Moab<WH4124> is cut<WH1438> off, and his arm<WH2220> is broken,<WH7665> said<WH5002> the LORD.<WH3068>

Make you him drunken:<WH7937> for he magnified<WH1431> himself against<WH5921> the LORD:<WH3068> Moab<WH4124> also shall wallow<WH5606> in his vomit,<WH6892> and he also<WH1571> shall be in derision.<WH7814>
For was not Israel<WH3478> a derision<WH7814> to you? was he found<WH4672> among thieves?<WH1590> for since<WH1767> you spoke<WH1697> of him, you skipped<WH5110> for joy.<WH8342>

O you that dwell<WH3427> in Moab,<WH4124> leave<WH5800> the cities,<WH5892> and dwell<WH7931> in the rock,<WH5553> and be like the dove<WH3123> that makes her nest<WH7077> in the sides<WH5676> of the hole's<WH6354> mouth.<WH6310>

We have heard<WH8085> the pride<WH1347> of Moab,<WH4124> (he is exceeding<WH3966> proud)<WH1343> his loftiness,<WH1363> and his arrogance,<WH1347> and his pride,<WH1347> and the haughtiness<WH7312> of his heart.<WH3820>
I know<WH3045> his wrath,<WH5678> said<WH5002> the LORD;<WH3068> but it shall not be so;<WH3651> his lies<WH907> shall not so<WH3651> effect<WH6213> it.
Therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> will I howl<WH3213> for Moab,<WH4124> and I will cry<WH2199> out for all<WH3605> Moab;<WH4124> my heart shall mourn<WH1897> for the men<WH582> of Kirheres.<WH7025>

O vine<WH1612> of Sibmah,<WH7643> I will weep<WH1058> for you with the weeping<WH1065> of Jazer:<WH3270> your plants<WH5189> are gone<WH5674> over<WH5674> the sea,<WH3220> they reach<WH5060> even to the sea<WH3220> of Jazer:<WH3270> the spoiler<WH7703> is fallen<WH5307> on your summer<WH7019> fruits and on your vintage.<WH1210>

And joy<WH8057> and gladness<WH8057> is taken<WH622> from the plentiful<WH3759> field, and from the land<WH776> of Moab,<WH4124> and I have caused wine<WH3196> to fail<WH7673> from the winepresses:<WH3342> none<WH3808> shall tread<WH1869> with shouting;<WH1959> their shouting<WH1959> shall be no<WH3808> shouting.<WH1959>

From the cry<WH2201> of Heshbon<WH2809> even to Elealeh,<WH500> and even to Jahaz,<WH3096> have they uttered<WH5414> their voice,<WH6963> from Zoar<WH6820> even to Horonaim,<WH2773> as an heifer<WH5697> of three<WH7992> years old:<WH7992> for the waters<WH4325> also<WH1571> of Nimrim<WH5249> shall be desolate.<WH4923>

Moreover I will cause to cease<WH7673> in Moab,<WH4124> said<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> him that offers<WH5927> in the high<WH1116> places, and him that burns<WH6999> incense<WH6999> to his gods.<WH430>

Therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> my heart<WH3820> shall sound<WH1993> for Moab<WH4124> like pipes,<WH2485> and my heart<WH3820> shall sound<WH1993> like pipes<WH2485> for the men<WH582> of Kirheres:<WH7025> because<WH5921> <WH3651> the riches<WH3502> that he has gotten<WH6213> are perished.<WH6>

For every<WH3605> head<WH7218> shall be bald,<WH7144> and every<WH3605> beard<WH2206> clipped:<WH1639> on all<WH3605> the hands<WH3027> shall be cuttings,<WH1417> and on the loins<WH4975> sackcloth.<WH8242>

There shall be lamentation<WH4553> generally<WH3605> on all<WH3605> the housetops<WH1406> of Moab,<WH4124> and in the streets<WH7339> thereof: for I have broken<WH7665> Moab<WH4124> like a vessel<WH3627> wherein is no<WH369> pleasure,<WH2656> said<WH5002> the LORD.<WH3068>

They shall howl,<WH3213> saying, How<WH349> is it broken<WH2865> down! how<WH349> has Moab<WH4124> turned<WH6437> the back<WH6203> with shame!<WH954> so shall Moab<WH4124> be a derision<WH7814> and a dismaying<WH4288> to all<WH3605> them about<WH5439> him.
For thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD;<WH3068> Behold,<WH2009> he shall fly<WH1675> as an eagle,<WH5404> and shall spread<WH6566> his wings<WH3671> over<WH413> Moab.<WH4124>

Kerioth<WH7152> is taken,<WH3920> and the strong<WH4679> holds<WH4679> are surprised,<WH8610> and the mighty<WH1368> men's hearts<WH3820> in Moab<WH4124> at that day<WH3117> shall be as the heart<WH3820> of a woman<WH802> in her pangs.<WH6887>
And Moab<WH4124> shall be destroyed<WH8045> from being a people,<WH5971> because<WH3588> <WH5921> he has magnified<WH1431> himself against<WH5921> the LORD.<WH3068>
Fear,<WH6343> and the pit,<WH6354> and the snare,<WH6341> shall be on you, O inhabitant<WH3427> of Moab,<WH4124> said<WH5002> the LORD.<WH3068>

He that flees<WH5211> from the fear<WH6343> shall fall<WH5307> into<WH413> the pit;<WH6354> and he that gets<WH5927> up out of the pit<WH6354> shall be taken<WH3920> in the snare:<WH6341> for I will bring<WH935> on it, even on Moab,<WH4124> the year<WH8141> of their visitation,<WH6486> said<WH5002> the LORD.<WH3068>

They that fled<WH5127> stood<WH5975> under the shadow<WH6738> of Heshbon<WH2809> because of the force:<WH3581> but a fire<WH784> shall come<WH3318> forth<WH3318> out of Heshbon,<WH2809> and a flame<WH3852> from the middle of Sihon,<WH5511> and shall devour<WH398> the corner<WH6285> of Moab,<WH4124> and the crown<WH6936> of the head<WH6936> of the tumultuous<WH1121> <WH7588> ones.<WH1121>
Woe<WH188> be to you, O Moab!<WH4124> the people<WH5971> of Chemosh<WH3645> perishes:<WH6> for your sons<WH1121> are taken<WH3947> captives,<WH7628> and your daughters<WH1323> captives.<WH7633>

Yet will I bring<WH7725> again<WH7725> the captivity<WH7622> of Moab<WH4124> in the latter<WH319> days,<WH3117> said<WH5002> the LORD.<WH3068> Thus<WH2008> far<WH2008> is the judgment<WH4941> of Moab.<WH4124>
